column4: anyone happen to know if it might mess up the conducting pad if I were to take off my heatsink (intel p4 stock)?
er - epiphany is a gnome browser

you just do a dist-upgrade
you don't need to reinstall
too many  ;-)

you will be able to do the same from a new CD

no, you won't
the whole point of the apt utility and policies is to avoid the problem you described
oic
synaptic is just pretty pictures with the power of apt behind it ;-)
